known_issues: Admin page still shows the same behavior after latest deployment; user requests urgent fix.

existing_features.title: Fix the admin page gating so it no longer shows the “Access Denied” screen for the intended seeded admin user; once logged in as the seeded admin principal, `/admin` must render the Admin Panel content (tabs and managers) instead of the access-denied card.

new_feature_requests.summary: Seed the user Principal `019c5b4d-8259-74a9-955b-9afe01e4fab7` as an admin in the backend AccessControl state so that after a fresh canister install, logging in with that Internet Identity is granted admin permissions.

Expose a backend method `isCallerAdmin()` that matches the frontend usage (the frontend calls `actor.isCallerAdmin()`), returning a boolean that is consistent with the AccessControl permission checks currently used by admin CRUD methods.

Ensure the seeded admin assignment persists across canister upgrades. If the AccessControl admin state is not currently persisted in stable state, add minimal upgrade-safe persistence, and add `backend/migration.mo` only if required by existing state per the project migration policy.

projectName: Fix admin access: seed admin principal and make /admin stop showing Access Denied
